description: This test is an e-learning material for all BD team members. It's a perfect training on how to speaking to clients, prepare for calls and proposals for clients. The test is based on Netguru Services 1pager.

published_attributes.serialized_body:
The test is an e-learning material for all BD team members. It's a perfect training on how to speaking to clients about our services, prepare for calls and proposals for clients.

The test is based on Netguru Services 1pager. Please read the article before taking the test.

To pass you need to gain 80%.

Good luck!

draft_attributes.title: Deliverables of a standard PDS include:

answers.definition: A meeting between the client and Netguru team of experts from the field of the development and project management. Client receives a report with a roadmap including technical recommendations and aligned with business vision.

An on-site workshop proceeded with preparations and followed with an extensive report, that will help to answer crucial business questions, plan the essential features of the product and reduce the risk of bringing the product to the market.

An evaluation service that will help improve the product by eliminating all UX issues to get a truly appealing and streamlined experience that users will love. Usually takes from 5  to 10 man days and are estimated per case basis. Increases business value of the product. It includes an assessment of the current state of the product and shows what elements should be improved.

A process of checking a web or a mobile application code aimed at making the product be more secure and work flawlessly and faster thanks to the bulletproof backend. Can be conducted for free depending on the situation.

A non-standard approach to address client’s pain and needs where the agenda is  crafted individually, especially for enterprise clients. In cooperation with Business Development Team, Product Design, Growth and Core.

An evaluation service that will help improve the product by eliminating all UX issues to get a truly appealing and streamlined experience that users will love. Usually takes from 5  to 10 man days and are estimated per case basis. Increases business value of the product. It includes an assessment of the current state of the product and shows what elements should be improved.

answers.body: No - “Ruby” is just an abbreviation of “Ruby on Rails”, a programming language
No - “Ruby” is just an abbreviation of “Ruby on Rails”, a programming framework
Yes - “Ruby” is a programming language and “Ruby on Rails” is a framework
Yes - “Ruby” is a framework and “Ruby on Rails” is a programming language

published_attributes.title: Is there a difference between “Ruby” and “Ruby on Rails”?

answers.body: No - “Ruby” is just an abbreviation of “Ruby on Rails”, a programming language
No - “Ruby” is just an abbreviation of “Ruby on Rails”, a programming framework
Yes - “Ruby” is a programming language and “Ruby on Rails” is a framework
Yes - “Ruby” is a framework and “Ruby on Rails” is a programming language

draft_attributes.title: Is there a difference between “Ruby” and “Ruby on Rails”?

answers.body: Ruby gives developers more freedom to choose from several different options to solve the same problem, and is designed to be flexible and empowering for programmers.
In Python code structure is more explicit - developer can easily tell where everything comes from and leads to – making it relatively simple to learn and debug.
Python can be used not only for a web development but also a data science and Machine Learning computations.
Only Ruby can be used to build and manage sites and applications of any complexity and functionality.

published_attributes.title: Difference between Ruby and Python - which of the answers is not correct?

answers.body: Ruby gives developers more freedom to choose from several different options to solve the same problem, and is designed to be flexible and empowering for programmers.
In Python code structure is more explicit - developer can easily tell where everything comes from and leads to – making it relatively simple to learn and debug.
Python can be used not only for a web development but also a data science and Machine Learning computations.
Only Ruby can be used to build and manage sites and applications of any complexity and functionality.

In SCRUM change can happen all the time, in Kanban no changes should be made during the sprint.
Kanban teams focus on reducing the time it takes to take a project from start to finish. Scrum teams focus on creating learning loops to quickly gather and integrate customer feedback.
Scrum is an Agile framework, Kanban is not.
Scrum has 2-week sprints, Kanban works based on a 3-weeks cycle.

published_attributes.title: What is the difference between Scrum and Kanban?

answers.body: In SCRUM change can happen all the time, in Kanban no changes should be made during the sprint.
Kanban teams focus on reducing the time it takes to take a project from start to finish. Scrum teams focus on creating learning loops to quickly gather and integrate customer feedback.
Scrum is an Agile framework, Kanban is not.
Scrum has 2-week sprints, Kanban works based on a 3-weeks cycle.
